casebody.data:
David L. FRASER et al., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. HOUSTON BELT & TERMINAL RAILWAY COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 29601

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Aug. 27, 1970. *935Harry L. Tindall, Horace F. Brown, Houston, Tex., for plaintiffs-appellants. Tommy B. Duke, A. J. Harper, II, Houston, Tex., for defendant-appellee; Fulbright, Crooker, Freeman, Bates & Jaworski, Houston, Tex., of counsel.

Before THORNBERRY, MORGAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5th Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966 [1970].
